title: Add molly-guard to prevent accidental shutdown/reboot via SSH
description:
Prevents accidental shutdown/reboot when connected via SSH by requiring you to type the hostname to confirm.

**Features:**
- Intercepts shutdown, reboot, halt, poweroff commands
- Requires typing hostname to confirm when connected via SSH
- Simple safety net for remote servers

**Implementation:** services.molly-guard.enable = true;

**Target:** hosts/hetzner-dev.nix

title: Add enhanced sysctl tuning with BBR congestion control
description:
Enhance kernel parameters for better performance.

**Additions to existing sysctl config:**
- net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control = bbr (faster TCP)
- net.core.rmem_max / wmem_max (larger buffers)
- kernel.pid_max = 4194303 (64-bit max)
- kern.maxproc = 65536

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/sysctl.nix

**Target:** hosts/hetzner-dev.nix (merge with existing sysctl)

title: Enable nix-ld for running dynamically linked binaries
description:
Enable nix-ld to run dynamically linked non-Nix executables (AppImages, prebuilt binaries, etc.).

**Features:**
- Runs binaries that expect FHS paths
- No need for patchelf or steam-run
- Useful for downloaded tools, AppImages

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/base.nix

**Implementation:** Single line - programs.nix-ld.enable = true;

**Target:** hosts/hetzner-dev.nix

title: Enhance Tailscale config with IPv6 forwarding for exit node
description:
Enable IPv6 forwarding for Tailscale exit node capability.

**Addition:**
- boot.kernel.sysctl."net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding" = "1"

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/tailscale.nix

**Use case:** Use hetzner-dev as exit node for other devices

**Target:** hosts/hetzner-dev.nix

title: Add K3s lightweight Kubernetes support
description:
Optional: Set up k3s for container orchestration beyond Docker.

**Features:**
- Lightweight Kubernetes (single binary)
- Optional Traefik ingress (can disable)
- GHCR image pull secrets support
- Namespace setup automation

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/k3s.nix

**Use case:** Running coding agents in isolated pods, container orchestration

**Target:** modules/k3s.nix (optional, only if needed)

title: Add additional Nix binary caches
description:
Add community binary caches to speed up builds.

**Caches to add:**
- devenv.cachix.org (devenv packages)
- nix-community.cachix.org (community packages)

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/nix-settings.nix

**Note:** Already have cachix module - may need to merge or extend

**Target:** modules/cachix.nix or hosts/hetzner-dev.nix

title: Add Podman as Docker alternative
description:
Optional: Set up Podman for rootless containers.

**Features:**
- Docker-compatible CLI
- Rootless containers (better security)
- No daemon required
- Nix-built image loading

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/podman.nix

**Use case:** Alternative to Docker with better security model

**Target:** modules/podman.nix (optional, only if needed)

title: Implement security audit module with auditd
description:
Set up comprehensive system auditing with auditd.

**Features:**
- Monitor execve syscalls (process execution)
- Watch sensitive files (/etc/passwd, /etc/shadow, /etc/sudoers)
- Monitor SSH keys and config changes
- Track network/time changes
- Kernel module loading/unloading
- Mount operations
- Log rotation

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/security-audit.nix

**Target:** modules/security-audit.nix

title: Implement disk-based automatic Nix garbage collection
description:
Port the disk-based GC module from loom repo. Unlike time-based GC, this checks disk space first and only runs when available space falls below a threshold.

**Features:**
- Configurable disk threshold (default 50 GiB)
- Maximum freed space per run
- Preserve recent generations (e.g., 14d)
- Low priority (nice 19, idle I/O)
- Randomized delay to avoid thundering herd

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/automatic-nix-gc.nix

**Target:** modules/automatic-nix-gc.nix + enable in hosts/hetzner-dev.nix

title: Enable VS Code Server for remote development
description:
Enable the vscode-server NixOS service for seamless VS Code Remote SSH development.

**Features:**
- Native VS Code Remote SSH support
- No manual server installation needed
- Auto-updates with system

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/vscode-server.nix

**Implementation:** Single line - services.vscode-server.enable = true;

**Target:** hosts/hetzner-dev.nix

title: Implement SOPS secrets management with SSH host key
description:
Set up sops-nix for encrypted secrets using the SSH host key for decryption.

**Features:**
- Secrets encrypted at rest in git
- Decrypts automatically on deploy using SSH host key
- No separate age key needed
- Per-machine secrets files

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/secrets.nix

**Requirements:**
- Add sops-nix to flake inputs
- Create modules/secrets.nix
- Set up secrets directory structure

**Target:** modules/secrets.nix + update flake.nix

title: Implement NixOS auto-update from git
description:
Port the auto-update module from loom repo. Polls a git repository and automatically deploys NixOS configuration when changes are detected.

**Features:**
- Configurable git repo URL and branch
- SSH key authentication support
- Lock file to prevent concurrent updates
- Tracks deployed revision to avoid re-deploys
- Optional nix-output-monitor (nom) integration
- Configurable poll interval

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/nixos-auto-update.nix

**Target:** modules/nixos-auto-update.nix

title: Add Fail2ban for SSH brute-force protection
description:
Enable fail2ban to protect against SSH brute-force attacks.

**Features:**
- Automatic IP banning on failed auth attempts
- Configurable ban time and retry limits
- Works with existing firewall

**Source:** https://github.com/ghuntley/loom/blob/main/infra/nixos-modules/fail2ban.nix

**Implementation:** Single line - services.fail2ban.enable = true;

**Target:** hosts/hetzner-dev.nix
